root: ^Greetings from Ugarit. We’re experiencing some minor food shortages. Please send a delegation of priests to bless the harvest. Thus is the will of the king.
^You’re lucky, you know, down in Egypt. I hear you aren’t even getting the earthquakes...

Port18: ^The King sends his regards. Hopefully the supply will recover before...I don’t even know. I’ve heard...things...from out west.
